name: Bleeding (Moreus)
description:
The player moves in the bloodstream and have task to stop bleeding by rebuilding the walls of the tissue. Reconstruction involves transporting platelets and maintaining them at the wound opening using "laser" fibrin.

The game was created by Janusz Gomułkiewicz and Mikołaj Gruszecki for Game Jam in Poland #StayHomeMakeGames(#ZostańWdomuRóbGry).

Programing & Graphic

Janusz Gomułkiewicz

Music & Sound

Mikołaj Gruszecki
